org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.encoding.encoder

Class GorillaEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.encoding.encoder.Encoder
      • org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.encoding.encoder.GorillaEncoder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoublePrecisionEncoder, SinglePrecisionEncoder

    public abstract class GorillaEncoder
extends Encoder
    Gorilla encoding. For more information about how it works, please see http://www.vldb.org/pvldb/vol8/p1816-teller.pdf
